All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class TestCaseConfiguration
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.testing.AbstractMojoTestCase

An AbstractMojoTestCase that ensures that configuration values as interpreted by Maven actually call the methods on an ListEntityClassnamesMojo instance as they should.

Since:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT

Laird Nelson

Method Detail

setUp

public void setUp()
           throws Exception
Loads up ${project.build.testOutputDirectory}/test-project/pom.xml, tells the Maven plugin testing harness to read it, and then gets the configured object from the harness and installs it as the value of the mojo field.

mojo

getBuildDirectory

public final File getBuildDirectory()
Returns the best available value for the writable, transient directory where the current build is happening.

This method never returns null.

Returns:
the build directory, never null

getTestOutputDirectory

public File getTestOutputDirectory()
Returns the best available value for the writable, transient directory where test classes are compiled to.

This method never returns null.

Returns:
the test output directory, never null
